item.title: Book 5: The Handmaid's Tale
item.description: This post will contain spoilers about the content of the book. If you haven’t read The Handmaid’s Tale yet, I recommend you do. To mix things up, I decided to read something that’s been on my to-read list for a couple years now. The Handmaid’s Tale is about a dystopian past in which a religious war broke out. Society gradually fell into an existence dominated by strict submission to religious law under penalty of death.
